newsitem.title: USA: People's Bank Q3 shr increases.
newsitem.headline: People's Bank Q3 shr increases.

text.p: (All data above 000s except per share numbers)
(All data above 000s except per share numbers)
NOTE: Provision for loan losses was $17.5 million for 1996 Q3 versus $7.6 million in the 1995 Q3.
Total deposits at September 30, 1996, were $5.10 billion versus $4.74 billion at September 30, 1995.
Total assets at September 30, 1996, were $7.24 billion versus $6.71 billion at September 30, 1995.
